::Blazer::

Spark's fly from the first droid's chest as Berserk's claws hit it, the drone 
firing his weapon. He misses, nearly hitting the second droid.

The first one takes a few steps back, slashing his sword at Berserk. The 
second one walks forward, firing his gun at the bot.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Blazer frowns as he sees the droids firing at Berserk. "Maybe I shouldn't 
have given them guns," he says to Sky Knight.
